programme.title: Emeril Cooks
programme.desc: Join Emeril and his dear friend Chef Aaron Sanchez as they explore a menu inspired by a trip to Cuba: CubanStyle Picadillo and Sweet Potato Casserole, Arroz con Puerco, and, of course, Croquetas.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon embraces vegetarian home cooking as he creates a fantastic meat-free breakfast, lunch and dinner guaranteed to win over the most committed of carnivores.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon’s guide to the Ultimate Home Cooking continues with sensational comfort food that’s guaranteed to make you feel warm inside. Recipes include spiced baked porridge.

programme.title: Gordon Ramsay's Ultimate Home Cooking
programme.desc: Gordon turns his focus to cooking brilliant picnic food for a great day out. Recipes include a gorgeous twist on classic Scotch eggs, an amazing giant sandwich called a pan bagnat.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay finds a befuddled staff and disappointing service at Zocalo, an Italian eatery in Philadelphia.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: La Galleria 33 is an Italian restaurant managed by sisters. Ramsay must fix their menu and their finances.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay helps La Galleria 33 deal with staffing issues, menu improvements and decor renovation.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay drops by Mama Maria's, a pizzeria in Brooklyn with an exhausted owner and an unmanageable staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay tries to improve a Pittsburgh eatery plagued by negative customer feedback and a squabbling staff.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay stops by Barefoot Bob's, a beachfront restaurant owned by a couple whose marriage is fraying.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Chef Ramsay checks on the status of Cafe Hon, Chiarella's and Leone's to see if they heeded his advice.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: At Olde Hitching Post, Chef Ramsay calms the owner and delegates duties to the co-owner: his daughter.

programme.title: Kitchen Nightmares
programme.desc: Levanti's is run into the ground. To save the day, Chef Ramsay must first mend the owners' relationship.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.desc: Host Jill Wagner travels to Texas to meet a leatherworker, Virginia to hang with a guitar crafter, and Chicago to learn about shoe making.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.desc: Jill visits a glassware crafter in Seattle, an in-demand bike maker in Ohio, and a Kentucky bookmaker with a 100-year-old printing press.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.desc: Jill meets a clockmaker in Michigan, a woodworker in North Carolina, and a blacksmith in Washington who shapes iron and defies stereotypes.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.desc: Jill meets married bladesmiths in the Alaskan backcountry, a master woodworker in North Carolina, and a handbag-making Texas leatherworker.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.sub-title: Wood Pens, Leather Boots and Doors
programme.desc: Jill heads to Illinois to see pens made from reclaimed wood, California to step out with a bootmaker, and New Mexico for repurposed doors.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.sub-title: Quilt Maker, Rifles and Stone Carver
programme.desc: Jill sits down with a quilt maker in Texas, a gunsmith who makes flintlock rifles in North Carolina, and a stone carver in Illinois.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.sub-title: Sgrafitto Ceramics, Wood Tables and Steampunk Lamps
programme.desc: The talent is in the details as Jill visits a New Jersey ceramicist, a Wisconsin woodworker, and a Minnesota steampunk lamp maker.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.sub-title: Woven Rugs, Sunglasses and Billiard Tables
programme.desc: Jill travels to Minnesota to meet a rug weaver, San Francisco to make handcrafted sunglasses, and New Jersey to learn about billiard tables.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.sub-title: Stained Glass, Baseballs, Footballs, and Jewelry Boxes
programme.desc: Jill meets a Minnesota artist creating stained glass, a New Jersey entrepreneur working with vintage balls, and a Wisconsin woodworker.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.desc: Jill meets married hat makers in Milwaukee, and then visits California artisans using exotic woods to design longbows and surfboards.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.sub-title: Denim Jeans, Wood Marquetry and Metal Bedframes
programme.desc: Jill visits a North Carolina custom-fit blue-jean maker, a Boston furniture maker, and an Oregon bedframe crafter using steel and wood.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.sub-title: Silver Flatware, Aviaries and Fly Fishing Rods
programme.desc: Jill meets a Massachusetts silversmith, a North Carolina aviary crafter, and, in Oregon, learns how to make traditional bamboo fly rods.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.sub-title: Outdoor Furniture, Flutes and Handmade Paper
programme.desc: Jill visits North Carolina to see whiskey barrels become furniture, Boston to watch metal become flutes, and Oregon to make paper from rags.

programme.title: Handcrafted America
programme.desc: Host Jill Wagner discovers handmade crafts that appeal to dads everywhere: bamboo fishing rods, handmade baseballs, knives and more!

programme.desc: Kyle travels to Mooresville, North Carolina to visit with former NASCAR Cup Series driver Dale Earnhardt Jr.

programme.title: Dinner Drive with Kyle Petty
programme.desc: Kyle Petty spends the day with professional golfer Davis Love III in St. Simons Island, Georgia.

programme.title: Dinner Drive with Kyle Petty
programme.desc: Kyle drops in on singer-songwriter Darius Rucker in his hometown of Charleston, South Carolina.

programme.desc: Kyle heads to Nazareth, Pennsylvania to visit with former race car driver Mario Andretti.

programme.desc: Kyle travels to Atlanta, Georgia to visit former wrestler, Ric Flair.

programme.desc: Kyle stops by to visit his dad, seven-time NASCAR champion Richard Petty, in their hometown North Carolina.

programme.title: Dinner Drive with Kyle Petty
programme.desc: Kyle travels to Wrightsville, Georgia to visit former football star, Herschel Walker, in his hometown.

programme.title: Dinner Drive with Kyle Petty
programme.desc: Kyle spends the day with rapper Pitbull in Miami, Florida, reminiscing over time spent in a unique car.

programme.title: Dinner Drive with Kyle Petty
programme.desc: Kyle Petty has been fortunate enough to see a different side to some of the most recognizable faces.

programme.title: Dinner Drive with Kyle Petty
programme.desc: Kyle Petty takes a trip to visit some of the most recognizable faces from the world of sports & entertainment.

programme.title: Dinner Drive with Kyle Petty
programme.desc: Kyle travels to Nashville, TN. nicknamed "Music City" to meet with half of the pop rock duo Hall & Oates.

programme.title: Dinner Drive with Kyle Petty
programme.desc: Kyle stops by Franklin, TN. to visit with 3-time NASCAR Cup Series Champion Darrell Waltrip.

programme.title: Dinner Drive with Kyle Petty
programme.desc: Kyle heads to Milton, GA. to visit Chipper Jones, Hall of Fame career playing for the Atlanta Braves.

programme.title: Dinner Drive with Kyle Petty
programme.desc: Kyle drops in on country music singer-songwriter John Rich who makes his home in the heart of Music City.
